core/__init__.py.module_doc:
Core package for SkillBot.

Central constants for the application (name and version) live here so
the UI, README and other modules can reference a single source of truth.

scripts/build_index.py.module_doc:
Build a code index (JSON + Markdown) for the repository.

Usage:
  python scripts/build_index.py [--root PATH] [--out-json PATH] [--out-md PATH]

Produces `code_index.json` and `CODE_INDEX.md` by def…

methods.name: show_toast
methods.doc:
Show unobtrusive toast/balloon notification via system tray if available.

Falls back to writing to the main log if tray is unavailable.

methods.name: setup_panic_hotkey
methods.doc: Register the emergency panic hotkey which immediately stops bots and exits.

methods.name: emergency_stop
methods.doc: Immediate emergency stop: force exit application immediately.

ui/styles.py.module_doc:
Modern CSS-like styles for SkillBot application
This module contains QSS (Qt Style Sheets) styles for modern UI design

functions.doc: Возвращает комбинированный современный стиль для приложения

ui/style_modules/base.py.module_doc:
Base styles for SkillBot application
This module contains basic component styles (buttons, checkboxes, inputs, etc.)

ui/style_modules/colors.py.module_doc:
Color definitions for SkillBot application
This module contains color variables used throughout the application

ui/style_modules/components.py.module_doc:
Component-specific styles for SkillBot application
This module contains styles for specific UI components (skills, autopot, etc.)

Responsive styles for SkillBot application
This module contains responsive and adaptive styles
